reviews.text: Bendemeer Shopping Mall is just a straight covered pedestrian mall between Block 25 and Block 27. It is located just next to Boon Keng MRT Station. It is non air conditioned shopping alley. It offers choices of products for shoppers like fruit, pastry, saloon, chinese herbs, banking, pawnshop. It is also next to Bendemeer Market. It is a convenient place to shop for daily needs. It was crowded during lunch time.

It‚Äôs a hustling and bustling shopping center especially over lunch and dinner! So watch out for that!
Their food is hit or miss! For me it‚Äôs always a hit if you know what you like and you‚Äôre not a food snob you will find comfort food here!
Groceries and errands can all be done here
Value dolllar bubble teas nails hair bakeries phone fixers etc
And considerably more affordable then if you went to an actually Mall/ city (despite boon Jeng being so close to the city)
Bendemeer Shopping Mall Claypot Delight stall helper is dishonest. Kept $50 note for $5.6 dish but did not return any change. Claimed to have returned me change but did not.

Bendemeer mall used to have old school chinese pastry such as egg tart, char Sao Soo and other great stuff.. unfortunately these have closed and changed to bubble tea. There are hidden great stall selling Chinese handmade dumplings on the spot, the market also have great variety of food but typically is served the morning and lunch crowd. The 2 coffee shop in the mall is usually very crowded during mealtime.

BENDEMEER Mall is my home üè† land .This is not only a beautiful mall BUT it is  located to Boon Keng MRT which is very convenient for everyone to VISIT. Both opposites entrances of mall have plenty of bus services and taxi stands. Very nearby is BENDEMEER Road Market and Food centre where you can find variety of food stalls you bound to love üíïüòò. Where can you find a place to have Best of both worlds so to speak üôäüó£Ô∏è.
